reviews.review_msg: Really good professor. His assignments are really good. The best part of the assignments is that they can be finished in one go if you are dedicated enough. His midterms are also student friendly. In totality, I would say that Brad is an excellent professor. I wish more professors follow his style of teaching.

Brad is an excellent professor . He really takes lot of efforts to make the lectures in a practical manner. He is really accessible to his office hours and his assignments are pretty easy and makes us to understand concepts in a practical way. His exams are really great. if you understand the concept, you can score full.
